Tucson Looks to Windlord as he holds his Katana.  With an assuring glance, =
he places a hand gently on Talon's shoulder.

" Those are very good questio=
ns Windlord.  I would like to see Nightlight and Elita safe here at the Ark=
.  Straight Shot will definitely take excellent care of them.  And she has =
permission to lodge as many quills into enemy metal as she deems fit.  It w=
ill give them a painful reminder not to underestimate the power of our join=
ed factions.  And Talon, well, Master Yokitron always said strength was alw=
ays greatest when you are in the company of your heart's affections.  So, I=
 want her to be with me.  Her skills are exceptional in their own right and=
 she deserves the chance to implement her talents."

Tucson stumbles a slig=
ht.  But quickly regains his footing.  

Meanwhile Rattrap spots Wheelie an=
d grins.  

" Hey look who decided ta wander in.  He sure deserves some " S=
HARP" reminders about insulting fellow comrades.  If ya know what I mean St=
raight Shot".

Straight Shot whispers.

" Well, not unless he says somethin=
g ta rub my quills the wrong way".

Perpetually on the move and constantly =
busy. 

On Aug 19, 2011, at 11:28 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@hotmai=
l.com> wrote:

> Windlord:
>  
>  
> "Sir"said the male to Tucson" What are=
 your orders regarding Nightlight and Elita? what will hapened with Talon?"=

> Tucson musters all his strength to hoist himself onto all fours and trans=
forms from the silver dragon into the silver dragon warrior. He narrows his=
 eyes as he takes a solid stance and wields an impressive Ninjutsu katana w=
ith a silver dragon coiled around the hilt.
> 
> " I'm ready, it's time to =
find Rodimus and free him of whatever demon is still tormenting him.  Then =
we retrieve the Matrix and put it in maximum security for safe keeping.  Af=
ter that, he must not get it back.   The Matrix must be given to Leo Prime,=
 where I feel it belongs."
> 
> Nightshift looks to Tucson.
> 
> " I dunno =
Tucson, The Matrix gave ya two upgrades already, I think that says a lot ab=
out ya."
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. ightlight a

e:

t the
> cordinates. He stroked his chin thoughtfully. "That cordinate, how
=
> close will it get us?"
> 
> WING SABER turned back to the console as he a=
ccessed the library
> computers. "Hmmm." He said after a few moments. "It s=
eems to be
> located somewhere inside of this."
> 
> A picture shows up on =
the screen. It is an arial view of a very large
> jungle. "This picture was=
 taken some time ago, but it is the
> approximate location that we recieved=
." WING SABER said.
> 
> LEO turned back to the others. "Then you folks had=
 better get your
> recharging done, it seems that we have some exploring to=
 do." He
> pointed back at the picture, "And there is a lot of land to cove=
r."
> 
> WING SABER looked over at NIGHTLIGHT, "And what ever happens, we w=
ill
> do what ever we have to do to save Rodimus."
> 
> There was a nod and=
 a look of grim determination on LEO's face. "he
> will be given every oppo=
rtunity to recovered. I promise you."
> 
> In the background, oblivious to =
the others LEGACY, BUMP and SANTON
> were working on SILVERBOLT.
